name: Car Tag: You're It
description:
Car Tag: You’re It is a 2-4 player, local multiplayer racing game which will be played split screen. Each player will control a car and will have one of two roles, the Runner, or the Chaser.

The Runner’s objective is to drive a set distance without getting caught while the Chaser’s objective is to catch the Runner before they reach this distance.

If the Chaser catches the Runner the then the players will swap roles. If the Runner reaches their target distance, they win the round.

The first player to win three rounds wins the game.

Controls
Mouse & Keyboard

Control Input Throttle W Brake S Steer A/D Handbrake Space Use Boost Shift Use Ability F Change Abilities Q/E Move Camera Mouse Switch Camera C Look Back Alt Pause Menu Esc
